Achievements.Name: Spoon Fed Ogre
Achievements.Description: Complete the game in Charming Difficulty.

Achievements.Name: Glorious Liege
Achievements.Description: Complete the game in Grimm Difficulty.

Achievements.Name: Hail to the King!
Achievements.Description: Complete all 20 missions of the game for the first time in any difficulty.

Achievements.Name: Questing Rookie
Achievements.Description: Complete 33% of the Challenge Quests in the game.

Achievements.Name: Questing Fiend
Achievements.Description: Complete 66% of the Challenge Quests in the game.

Achievements.Name: Questing Ogre
Achievements.Description: Complete all the Challenge Quests in the game.

Achievements.Name: For the Fridge
Achievements.Description: Collect 33% of Coloring Book Pages in the game. (Any Difficulty)

Achievements.Name: Upstart Artist
Achievements.Description: Collect 66% of Coloring Book Pages in the game. (Any Difficulty)

Achievements.Name: Art Collector
Achievements.Description: Collect 100% of Coloring Book Pages in the game. (Any Difficulty)

Achievements.Name: The Finisher
Achievements.Description: Perform 100 finishing moves.

Achievements.Name: The Juggler
Achievements.Description: Launch 50 Enemies into the air then catch them with Shrek.

Achievements.Name: Survivor Shrek
Achievements.Description: Achieve a Perfect on every level. (Normal difficulty or higher)

Achievements.Name: Super Ogre
Achievements.Description: Use Super Ogre Power 5 times with Shrek or Fiona.

Achievements.Name: Novice Collector
Achievements.Description: Collect 33% of all Souvenir Mugs in the game. (Any Difficulty)

Achievements.Name: Amateur Collector
Achievements.Description: Collect 66% Souvenir Mugs in the game. (Any Difficulty)

Achievements.Name: Master Collector
Achievements.Description: Collect all Souvenir Mugs in the game. (Any Difficulty)

Achievements.Name: Ice Dragon Tamer
Achievements.Description: Defeat the Ice Dragon. (Normal Difficulty or higher).

Achievements.Name: Music Critic
Achievements.Description: Defeat Captain Hook. (Normal Difficulty or higher).

Achievements.Name: Upstaged Charming
Achievements.Description: Defeat Prince Charming. (Normal Difficulty or higher).

Achievements.Name: The Collector
Achievements.Description: Complete all of The Collector series of quests.

Achievements.Name: Super Ogre Power Extreme
Achievements.Description: Use Super Ogre Power 10 times with any character.

Achievements.Name: Ogre Smash!
Achievements.Description: Use Fairy Dust Attack 50 times with any character.
